meeting_info.organization: Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the January 9, 2025 meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Propose Timeline for Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Propose timeline to conduct the annual performance review for City Council Appointed Officials (City Attorney, City Secretary, City Manager, and Inspector General).

agenda_items.title: Procurement Process for HR Consultant Services
agenda_items.description: Consider recommendation to City Council to start procurement process for human resources consultant services for performance evaluations of City Council-appointed positions.
